T03D3798:139b-30: gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston to //

T03D3798:140a-1: yongs su gtong snyam du bsams nas /

T03D3798:140b-18: nyid yin pas grol ba'i rgyu'i ngo bo yin par

T03D3798:141a-16: tha tshig go // stong pa nyid rtogs pa'i 'bras

T03D3798:141a-27: phyir myu gu med par zhes bya ba la sogs

T03D3798:141b-23: 'jig rten 'di na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //

T03D3798:151b-4: 'dir ni phyir ma phyin snga ma snga ma'i rgyu yin par khong du chud par bya'o //
T03D3798:151b-5: gang gis na de lta bur 'gyur ba 'di'i ngo
T03D3798:151b-6: bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid ci zhig yin zhe na
T03D3798:151b-7: / ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid de yang rnam pa brgyad do //
T03D3798:151b-8: dka' ba byed pa'i ngo bo nyid ni 'gro ba'i
T03D3798:151b-9: skyabs la sogs pa bya dka' dka' yang de go
T03D3798:151b-11: grags chen zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba yin no //
T03D3798:151b-12: de ltar na ji ltar rmongs par mi 'gyur zhe na /
T03D3798:151b-13: mi dmigs pa'i ngo bo nyid de de'i don du
T03D3798:151b-14: brtson yang de'i phung po la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid
T03D3798:151b-16: phung po zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba yin no //
T03D3798:151b-17: 'o na ni rnam par byang ba la mngon par zhen par 'gyur ro zhe na /
T03D3798:151b-18: mngon par zhen pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid de
T03D3798:151b-19: theg pa gsum gyi dbang du byas nas rnam par
T03D3798:151b-20: yang ba la mngon par zhen pa med cing the
T03D3798:151b-21: tshom med pa rnams rang dang gzhan gyi don las
T03D3798:151b-22: phyir mi ldog pa nyid du nges par gzung ba'i
T03D3798:151b-23: phyir theg pa gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T03D3798:151b-25: g-yo ba med pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyogs kyis so //
T03D3798:151b-26: mi 'khrugs chos can ni mya ngan las 'das pa
T03D3798:151b-27: ste de lta ma yin na phyin ci log pa'i
T03D3798:151b-28: phyir mi ldog pa nyid ma yin no snyam du
T03D3798:151b-30: spros pa med pa ni the tshom chung ngu la sogs pa gsum dang bral ba'i phyir te /
T03D3798:151b-31: de nyid the tshom zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no //
T03D3798:151b-32: yang ji ltar na theg pa chen por 'du shes
T03D3798:151b-33: pa de yang phyin ci log pa nyid yin de'i
T03D3798:151b-34: yul ni shin tu rnam par byang ba'i phyir ro
T03D3798:151b-36: dmigs pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid de chos zab
T03D3798:151b-37: pa nyid kyis dmigs par bya ba dang dmigs par
T03D3798:151b-38: byed pa'i khyad par med pas ston pa yang chos
T03D3798:151b-39: kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'jug pa la thugs las
T03D3798:151b-40: chung ngur mdzad pa'i phyir 'dren pa rnams kyi zhes
T03D3798:151b-41: bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba yin te rtogs
T03D3798:151b-42: pa ni mthong ba'i lam gyis so //
T03D3798:151b-43: thob pa ni bsgom pas so //
T03D3798:152a-0: sus shes snyam zhes bya ba ni 'gas @152a * //
T03D3798:152a-1: kyang mi go'o snyam nas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste /
T03D3798:152a-2: yang dag par na med pa'i phyir dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs la mngon par dga' ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3798:152a-3: de'i phyir 'jig rten dang mi mthun pa'i ngo bo nyid ni /
T03D3798:152a-4: sems can rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba yin no //
T03D3798:152a-5: gnas zhes bya ba ni sems can du lta ba
T03D3798:152a-6: ste de ni yul la dred pa la sogs pa'i
T03D3798:152a-8: 'dzin pa ni chos su rnam par rtog pa'o //
T03D3798:152a-9: mi mkhas pa ni sems can du lta ba'o //
T03D3798:152a-10: blun rmongs pa ni yul la mngon par 'dod pas so //
T03D3798:152a-11: mun pa bzhin zhes bya ba ni 'dzin pa la sogs par rtogs pas so //
T03D3798:152a-12: chos ni de dang mi mthun pa yin pas /
T03D3798:152a-13: thob par bya ba'i chos ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3798:152a-14: des na 'jig rten dag dang rtsod pa 'byung zhes
T03D3798:152a-15: bya ba ni de'i phyir rtsod do zhes bya ba'i
T03D3798:152a-16: tha tshig go // de nyid rab tu sgrub pa'i
T03D3798:152a-17: phyir gzhi med pa'i ngo bo nyid de chos kyi
T03D3798:152a-18: dbyings ni phyogs thams cad kyi nam mkha' bzhin du
T03D3798:152a-19: gzugs la sogs pa'i gzhi med pa'i phyir rang bzhin
T03D3798:152a-20: gyi gzhi ma yin pa'i phyir nam mkha'i zhes bya
T03D3798:152a-21: ba la sogs pa 'byung ba yin no //
T03D3798:152a-22: ci'i phyir tha dad pa nyid med ce na /
T03D3798:152a-23: 'di ltar bye brag gyur ba med de thams cad du dben par mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir te /
T03D3798:152a-24: de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyang zhes bya ba lhag ma yin no //
T03D3798:152a-26: 'gro ba med pa'i mtshan nyid de kun rdzob tu dus dang /
T03D3798:152a-27: rnam par byang ba la sogs pa tha dad kyang
T03D3798:152a-28: de kho na nyid la 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i
T03D3798:152a-29: khyad par du 'gro ba med pa'i phyir 'das pa'i
T03D3798:152a-30: zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba yin te
T03D3798:152a-31: / 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa zhes de skad du sbyar ro //
T03D3798:152a-32: bye brag med pa ni 'dzin pa la sogs pas
T03D3798:152a-33: dben pa ni thams cad du 'dra ba'i phyir ro
T03D3798:152a-34: // de rab tu sgrub pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid mi dmigs pa'i ngo bo nyid de /
T03D3798:152a-35: de kho na nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub
T03D3798:152a-36: pa ni de bzhin nyid la yang mi dmigs pa'i
T03D3798:152a-37: ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir dang de ni de'i
T03D3798:152a-38: rjes su mthun pa'i phyir de'i don du yang shes
T03D3798:152a-39: rab la brtson par bya ba yin pas /
T03D3798:152b-0: bde gshegs byang chub ces bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba @152b yin te ;
T03D3798:152b-1: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid ces bya bar skabs dang sbyar ro //
T03D3798:152b-2: thob 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thob par 'dod pa'o //
T03D3798:152b-4: 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i bye brag yod na tha dad pa dang bral ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3798:152b-5: sbyor zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpas zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T03D3798:152b-7: shes rab med na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T03D3798:152b-8: bya 'dab gshog med pa snyam rtsa la med pa
T03D3798:152b-9: bzhin du de las gzhan pa'i dge ba bsags kyang
T03D3798:152b-10: thabs dang shes rab kyi 'dab gshog med nas gzhan
T03D3798:152b-11: du lhung ba srid pa'i phyir /
T03D3798:152b-12: bya zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T03D3798:152b-13: lus dpag tshad brgya lnga bcu pa zhes smos pa
T03D3798:152b-14: ni de lta bur chen po yang 'dab gshog med
T03D3798:152b-15: na nam mkha' la 'gro bar mi nus par bstan
T03D3798:152b-16: pa'i phyir ro // sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas
T03D3798:152b-17: nas 'dzam bu'i gling du 'ong ba smos pa ni
T03D3798:152b-18: yul thag ring bar bstan pa'i phyir te thag nye
T03D3798:152b-19: bar 'gro ba ni sgrub pa sla ba'i phyir 'dab
T03D3798:152b-20: gshog med kyang ji zhig ltar nus so //
T03D3798:152b-21: mchongs na zhes bya ba ni bor na'o //
T03D3798:152b-22: der ni zhes bya ba ni de nas sam 'dzam bu'i gling der ni zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T03D3798:152b-23: dngos bstan pa'i phyir rgyal ba rnams kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3798:152b-24: dge ba gzhan nye bar bsags pa yang mtha' dag
T03D3798:152b-25: gi sgo nas ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
T03D3798:152b-26: pa la sogs pa lnga char sgrub pa'i phyir ro
T03D3798:152b-27: // gal te shes rab med na ji ltar pha
T03D3798:152b-28: rol tu phyin par tha snyad gdags shen bden mod
T03D3798:152b-29: // kyi / gzhan gyi bsam pa dang bstun par gsungs pa'i phyir nyes pa med do //
T03D3798:152b-30: dus ring ba'i sgo nas ni bskal pa du mar yang dag par sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3798:152b-31: spel ba'i sgo nas ni smon lam chen po mtha' yas pa bsgoms pas de spel ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3798:152b-32: 'o na kyang nges par 'dzin pa'i gtso bo med pa'i phyir byang chub mi 'thob pas /
T03D3798:152b-33: thabs med ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T03D3798:152b-34: mtshan nyid kyi rab tu phye ba bshad zin to /
T03D3798:152b-36: // / thabs dang shes rab 'bras bu dang bcas pa
T03D3798:152b-37: yang thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa can yin pas
T03D3798:153a-0: / sangs rgyas theg pa 'di la nges par 'byung zhes @153a * //
T03D3798:153a-1: bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te sbyin pa la
T03D3798:153a-2: sogs pa yang dag par sgrub pa la mkhas pa
T03D3798:153a-3: mtshan mar ma byas pa ni rnam pa thams cad
T03D3798:153a-4: mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la thar pa'i
T03D3798:153a-5: cha dang mthun pa yin par 'dod do //
T03D3798:153a-6: 'di la zhes bya ba ni ji skad bshad pa'i
T03D3798:153a-7: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la zhes bya bar sbyar
T03D3798:153a-8: ro // nges par 'byung 'dod ces bya ba ni
T03D3798:153a-9: mtshan ma med pa'i sbyin pa la sogs pa la
T03D3798:153a-10: mos pas nges par 'byung bar 'dod pa zhes bya
T03D3798:153a-12: gang zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'o //
T03D3798:153a-13: de ltar thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa thob pa
T03D3798:153a-14: de ni sbyor ba'i lam la nges par 'byed pa'i
T03D3798:153a-15: cha dang mthun pa sgrub par byed pas 'gro ba
T03D3798:153a-16: kun la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te
T03D3798:153a-17: / sems snyoms zhes bya ba ni dro bar gyur
T03D3798:153a-18: pa thob pa ni brjod pa tsam du mos pas
T03D3798:153a-19: rang dang gzhan mnyam pa nyid thob pa'i phyir ro
T03D3798:153a-20: / // pha ma'i 'du shes zhes bya ba ni
T03D3798:153a-21: rtag tu de dag la 'dod pa don du gnyer
T03D3798:153a-22: / // ba'i phyir ro // phan pa'i sems ni rtse mor gyur pa'i gnas skabs pa'i yin te /
T03D3798:153a-23: phyi ma la phan par bya bar sems pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3798:153a-24: byams pa'i yid ces bya ba ni bzod pa'i gnas skabs na yod pa ste /
T03D3798:153a-25: bde ba kha na ma thob pa med pa nye bar sgrub par sems pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3798:153a-26: tha ba med pa ni chos kyi mchog gi gnas skabs na yod pa yin te /
T03D3798:153a-27: gnod sems med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3798:153a-28: drang la zhes bya ba ni g-yo med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3798:153a-29: de ltar bsam pa bstan nas /
T03D3798:153a-30: sbyor ba bstan pa'i phyir tshig 'jam zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3798:153a-31: 'dis ni byams pa'i lus kyi las kyang nye bar mtshon pa yin no //
T03D3798:153a-32: 'di dag kyang gong du bshad pa ni de kho
T03D3798:153a-33: na nyid yid la yid pa'i khyad par gyis rab
T03D3798:153a-35: de ni 'gro ba la phan pa'i thabs kyi khyad
T03D3798:153a-36: par du byas pa yin te de'i phyir zlos pa
T03D3798:153a-38: de bzhin du gzhan la yang mi zlos pa nyid du skabs kyis khong du chud par bya'o //
T03D3798:153a-39: mi ldog rig par bya zhes gsungs pa gang yin
T03D3798:153a-40: pa de lam 'di la de dag gi rtags kyi
T03D3798:153a-41: rab tu dbye ba gang yin zhe na /
T03D3798:153a-42: 'jig rten mgon la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T03D3798:153a-43: phyogs tsam zhes bya ba ni de dag gi yon
T03D3798:153b-0: tan mtha' dag ni @153b bstan pa'am mnyan par mi
T03D3798:153b-1: nus pa'i phyir ro snyam du dgongs pa yin no
T03D3798:153b-2: // phyir mi ldog pa de dag kyang nges par
T03D3798:153b-3: 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa dang mthong ba dang
T03D3798:153b-4: bsgom pa'i lam gyi byed brag gis rnam pa gsum
T03D3798:153b-5: // mo // de la yon tan bcu drug gis
T03D3798:153b-6: nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i gnas skabs
T03D3798:153b-7: dag yin pas mtha' dag 'du shes bral zhes bya
T03D3798:153b-8: ba la sogs pa smos te /
T03D3798:153b-9: phung po la sogs pa brjod pa tsam du rtogs
T03D3798:153b-10: pa'i phyir tha dad pa nyid kyi 'du shes nyid
T03D3798:153b-11: med pa dang / 'thad par smra pa dang /
T03D3798:153b-12: gzhan mu stegs can la mi brten pa'i phyir dkon mchog gsum la mi phyed pa nyid dang /
T03D3798:153b-13: rtag tu sdig pa spong ba dang /
T03D3798:153b-14: rang yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i las kyi lam la brten pa dang /
T03D3798:153b-15: 'gro ba yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir zang zing med par chos kyi mchog sbyin pa dang /
T03D3798:153b-16: sgrib pa spang ba'i phyir chos zab mo la mngon par dga' ba dang /
T03D3798:153b-17: byams pa'i nag gi las dang /
T03D3798:153b-18: spyod la ma thams cad du legs pa shes bzhin ngag ldan pa dang /
T03D3798:153b-19: gzung ba'i g-yeng ba med pa ni rtag tu phyi
T03D3798:153b-20: nang gi gtsang sbra dang ldan pas gzhan mu stegs
T03D3798:153b-21: can dad par bya ba'i phyir nang gi gtsang sbra
T03D3798:153b-23: bsod nams kyi mthus chos la sogs pa la dring
T03D3798:153b-24: ba la sogs pa med pa'i phyir gos la gzob
T03D3798:153b-25: pa dang / lus kyi las la sogs pa kha
T03D3798:153b-26: na ma thob ba med pa'i phyir sgo gsum dben
T03D3798:153b-28: sbyangs pa'i yon tan kun nas nyon mongs pa med
T03D3798:153b-29: pa yang dag par len pa'i phyir rnyed pa la
T03D3798:153b-30: sogs pa la mi lta ba dang /
T03D3798:153b-31: 'dzin pa'i g-yeng ba med na pha rol tu phyin
T03D3798:153b-32: pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs rnams kyis mi 'khrugs pa'i
T03D3798:153b-35: bdud la sogs pas byang chub las mi ldog pa'i phyir gzhan gyi dring mi 'jigs pas so //
T03D3798:153b-36: yon tan 'di dag ni dro bar gyur pa la
T03D3798:153b-37: sogs pa'i gnas skabs su ci rigs par sbyar bar
T03D3798:153b-38: bya'o // bcu drug gis mthong ba'i lam gyi gnas skabs dag yin pas /
T03D3798:153b-39: bsam gtan bzhi la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T03D3798:153b-40: bsam gtan bzhi yid la byed pa'i phyir rnam par mi g-yeng ba dang /
T03D3798:154a-1: bsngal gyi rnam pa la phyin ci ma log pa
T03D3798:154a-2: ni bsam gtan la mi gnas pa'i phyir ro myang
T03D3798:154a-4: chos thams cad stong pa nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir grags pa mi 'dod pa dang /
T03D3798:154a-5: kun nas mnar sems kyi dngos po dag bdag med
T03D3798:154a-6: par khong du chud pa'i phyir khro ba med pa
T03D3798:154a-7: dang / thabs la mkhas pa ni srid pa med
T03D3798:154a-8: kyang 'jig rten la snying brtse bas de dag dang
T03D3798:154a-9: mthun par khyim na gnas pa kun du ston pa'i
T03D3798:154a-10: phyir dngos po la mngon par zhen pa med pa
T03D3798:154a-11: dang / dang / 'tsho ba'i ched du yang bas
T03D3798:154a-12: longs spyod sgrub pa med pa'i phyir 'tsho ba dag
T03D3798:154a-13: dang / dang / pa dang / nyon mongs pa
T03D3798:154a-14: can gyi sems kyis drag shul mi spyod pa dang
T03D3798:154a-15: dang / dang / pa dang / / bud med
T03D3798:154a-16: dbang du bya ba la sogs pa mi sbyor ba'i
T03D3798:154a-17: phyir lus kyi las dam pa dang /
T03D3798:154a-18: khye'u 'gyur ro zhe'am bu mor 'gyur ro zhes bya
T03D3798:154a-19: ba ston pa la sogs pa spangs pa'i phyir dag
T03D3798:154a-20: gi las nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa dang
T03D3798:154a-21: / dngos po thams cad rang bzhin gyis mya ngan
T03D3798:154a-22: las 'das par rtogs pa'i phyir dben pa'i shes rab
T03D3798:154a-23: la mngon par brtson pa dang /
T03D3798:154a-24: ngo bo nyid kyis zhi bar khong du chud pa'i
T03D3798:154a-25: phyir 'thab pa la sogs pa dang bral ba dang
T03D3798:154a-26: / rgyud gzhan la yang chos gya nom pa nye
T03D3798:154a-27: bar sgrub pa'i bsam pa can yin pa'i phyir byams
T03D3798:154a-29: de kho na nges par 'byung ba yin pa'i rtogs
T03D3798:154a-30: pas byang chub gzhan mngon par mi 'dod pa'i phyir
T03D3798:154a-31: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'dod cing de'i bstan pa
T03D3798:154a-33: mtha' 'khor ba la sogs pa spangs pa'i phyir skye ba la dbang ba nyid dang /
T03D3798:154a-34: rigs pa dang ldan pa'i chos rtogs pas bdag nyid
T03D3798:154a-35: la phyir mi ldog pa nyid du nges par 'dzin
T03D3798:154a-36: pa'i phyir rang gis la the tshom med pa dang
T03D3798:154a-37: / rang gi rtogs pa ri rab dang 'dra ba'i phyir mi g-yo ba nyid dang /
T03D3798:154a-38: 'di kho na nges par 'byung ba yin no zhes
T03D3798:154a-39: zhes bya bar rtogs na de'i phyir srog kyang yongs
T03D3798:154a-40: su 'dor ba'i phyir dam pa'i chos la dga' bas
T03D3798:154a-41: so // 'di dag ni bden pa so so'i bzod pa dang /
T03D3798:154a-42: shes pa dang mthun par ci rigs par mi rtag
T03D3798:154a-43: pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i sgo nas blta bar
T03D3798:154a-44: bya'o // bsgom pa'i lam la gnas pa rnams ni
T03D3798:154b-0: @154b chos zab mo ji ltar mthong ba goms par
T03D3798:154b-2: gzugs dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T03D3798:154b-3: mtshan ma med pa ni rang bzhin gyis gzugs su
T03D3798:154b-4: rung ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma med pa'i phyir
T03D3798:154b-5: ro // zhi ba ni stong pa nyid dang smon pa med pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir te /
T03D3798:154b-6: de'i phyir zab bo snyam du dgongs pa yin no //
T03D3798:154b-7: dper na mda' yis zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T03D3798:154b-8: ni 'di skad du mda' la sogs pas rgya mtsho'i
T03D3798:154b-9: rting bzhin du ji skad du bshad pa'i tshul du
T03D3798:154b-10: shes rab kyi phung po la sogs pa la gting
T03D3798:154b-11: ma rnyed pa ni phyir mi ldog pa dag yin
T03D3798:154b-12: par rig par bya'o zhes bshad pa yin no //
T03D3798:154b-13: 'di nyid kyi yon tan dri ba sngon du 'gro ba can bstan pa'i phyir /
T03D3798:154b-14: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3798:154b-15: zab gyur zhes bya ba ni gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3798:154b-16: theg pa ni byang chub kyi lam yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3798:154b-17: don dam pa ni ye shes dam pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3798:154b-18: chags med ni rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3798:154b-19: de yang chos la bdag med pa ston par byed

T03D3798:167a-25: pa phul du byung bar gyur na phyir mi ldog

T03D3798:167a-27: zin pa ni de las gzhan pa'i rjes su yi
T03D3798:167a-28: rang bar byed pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi 'byung
T03D3798:167a-29: gnas mchog yin pas mi ldog ces bya ba la

T03D3798:171a-40: // mchog rig ces bya ba ni mngon du bya bar 'dod pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //

T03D3798:171b-27: de bstan pa'i phyir bslab pa 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T03D3798:171b-28: 'di ni zhes byas ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bslab pa 'di'o //

T03D3798:189a-13: te / na / skad cig ma gcig kho nas
T03D3798:189a-14: rtogs par bya ba thams cad mngon sum du byed
T03D3798:189a-15: te / na / pa'i phyir ro // chos kyi sku ni rnam par smin pa'i sgo nas te /
T03D3798:189a-16: de ltar zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni spros pa med
T03D3798:189a-17: pa'i ye shes dang chos nyid rnam par dag pa
T03D3798:189a-19: yang na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la
T03D3798:189a-20: sogs pa gsum ni yul gyi sgo nas bstan to
T03D3798:189a-21: // de'i 'og ma bzhi ni rgyu'i sgo nas so //
T03D3798:189a-22: chos kyi sku mdzad pa dang bcas pa ni 'bras bu'i sgo nas bstan par rig par bya'o //
T03D3798:189a-23: 'bras bu la lta gzhan gyis kyang ;
T03D3798:189a-24: ; bcol na ci phyir 'bad mi bya //
T03D3798:189a-25: gu nas mi tra kho na'i ngor //
T03D3798:189a-27: de ltas 'di ni bdag gis zur 'dis bdag nyid blun par bstan nges kyis //
T03D3798:189a-28: mkhas pa thugs rjes rdzogs pa dag gis da 'dir go rims cung zad mdzod //
T03D3798:189a-29: 'gro ba de nyid rtag dka'i gzhung las bstan pa rtogs dka'i khyim gcig po //
T03D3798:189a-30: shes rab pha rol phyin tshul 'di la bdag 'dra blun pos ci byar yod //
T03D3798:189a-31: dri med dge ba'i zer gyis mun pa kun bsal ba'i //
T03D3798:189a-32: ye shes rin po che yi tshig shas 'grel byas nas //
T03D3798:189a-33: dge ba 'dir thob gang des re zhig 'jig rten gyi //
T03D3798:189a-34: yid la ci nas sangs rgyas ye shes tshul 'jug
T03D3798:189a-35: shog / sdud pa tshigs su bcad pa'i dka' 'grel
T03D3798:189a-36: slob dpon bud dha shr'i dzny'a nas mdzad pa rdzogs
T03D3798:189a-38: / rgya gar gyi mkhan po bidya ka ra singha dang /
